subject: RE: [Read_Alphabet] Will Get Right Back to You
msgSnippet: Oh, no, I did.  Sorry guys, I didn t think about the trouble it would wreak on the newsgroups! wiT grEt apolajIz, mOst humblI yXz, Shalom v Tovah, Jon My
messageBody:
Message
Oh, no, I did.  Sorry guys, I didn't think about the trouble it would wreak on the newsgroups!
wiT grEt apolajIz, mOst humblI yXz,

Shalom v'Tovah,

Jon    
My Website URL: www.frimmin.com
*****************************************************
It is more necessary to love much than to think much;
always do that which impels you most to love.

        --St. Teresa of Avila, The Interior Castle

-----Original Message-----
From: Chuck [mailto:chuck091956@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 31, 2002 4:32 PM
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Will Get Right Back to You

I Think Jon has his 'Out of Office' feature turned on.

 Jon <jon@...> wrote:

I'm sorry I can't respond right now.  I'm taking some very well-earned time off, but I'll be back soon and I'll get right back to you.

Thanks, and Shalom v'Tovah,

jon
